briefTitle: Phase III Study of Sorafenib in Patients With Renal Cell Carcinoma (RCC)
officialTitle: A Multicenter Uncontrolled Study of Sorafenib in Patients With Unresectable and/or Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma
summary: A multicenter uncontrolled study of sorafenib in patients with unresectable and/or metastatic renal cell carcinoma (RCC) to assess the pharmacokinetic profile, safety and tolerability, and efficacy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics Measured as Area Under Curve (AUC[0-12h])
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 12 hours after at least 21 days of uninterrupted dosing
